DOC.brief_summary: This study is aimed at investigating the long term clinical outcome of patients with uveitis.
DOC.detailed_description: Patients will be included if they are treated for uveitis and have had repeat follow-up. Data will be gathered from the entire length of the patients follow-up. The main outcome measures will be: Change from baseline of Best corrected visual acuity (BCVA)at 10 years Causes of vision loss (≤6/15, VL) and severe vision loss (≤6/60, SVL) at 10 years Number of clinical visits at 10 years.
DOC.criteria: Clinical Diagnosis of Uveitis. No followup data.
